entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Ingonish
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:56 AM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 6.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ingonish Beach 1:00 PM AST Thursday 16 February 2023
Temperature: 6.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.1 kPa rising
Humidity: 83 %
Dewpoint: 3.8°C
Wind: SW 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Showers. High 7.
entry.summary: Showers ending this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 1 except minus 5 over the Highlands.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 1 except minus 5 over the Highlands. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. High zero except minus 3 over the Highlands.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning. Snow mixed with ice pellets in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain late in the afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High zero except minus 3 over the Highlands. Wind chill minus 9 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Freezing rain or snow. Low minus 4.
